content: Will there be a forum for hosting events? I have some ideas that I'd like to try in my area that might be reproducible across the country, but I'm totally new to this and looking for support.

I am also trying to host events.  I have two planned on August 13 and August 15 and will invite about 250 folks who helped me mobilize voters in battleground states in 2020.  However, the only kinds of events I am currently allowed to host with the Mobilize platform are Phone Banks and DNC Watch parties.  I need the expanded access for community events.  Can someone help?
